title: Kurt Vonnegut on the 8 "shapes" of stories
description: Before fame, Kurt Vonnegut wrote a master's thesis on the shapes of stories for the anthropology department at the University of Chicago.
notes:
‚ÄúWhat uncle Alex found objectionable about so many human beings is that they so seldom noticed it when they were happy,‚Äù Vonnegut said.

His uncle made a habit of noticing the good times: When Vonnegut and his family would be drinking lemonade under a tree on a summer day, his uncle would suddenly exclaim, ‚ÄúWait a minute, stop! If this isn‚Äôt nice, I don‚Äôt know what is!‚Äù

title: Why your daily stand-ups don't work and how to fix them
description: Daily stand-ups are a classic example of learned helplessness. We all know they‚Äôre useless, but we tell ourselves ‚Äúthat‚Äôs just how things are‚Äù and do nothing...
notes:
Prioritise going through the backlog and adjusting according to any blockers.
Stand ups are not about making sure people are working, they should be focused on getting things done and delivering software to the customer.

title: To Become Wise, Do Less!
description: Embrace leisure and abhor the need to always be productive to actually become productive
notes:
Leisure gives the scribe the chance to acquire wisdom; a man with few commitments can grow wise. How can the ploughman become wise, whose sole ambition is to wield the goad, driving his oxen, engrossed in their work, his conversation limited to bullocks, his thoughts absorbed in the furrows he traces and his long evenings spent in fattening heifers?

Sirach 38: 24-26

title: Bloomberg - Are you a robot?
notes: A recent study of 24 years of data found that lower-income neighborhoods experienced road fatality rates more than 3.6 times higher than wealthier places. Research also shows that Blacks and Latinos are at considerably higher risk on the road ‚Äî especially as pedestrians and bicyclists ‚Äî than white populations. African Americans and Native Americans make up 12.9% of the population but they represent 22% of pedestrian deaths. In all, people of color are 54% more likely to be struck and killed while walking in the US.

title: Scaling PostgresML to 1 Million Requests per Second
